DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate efficacy safety LAS 41005 compare cryotherapy subject moderate severe hyperkeratotic actinic keratosis ( punch biopsy ) .
DOC.criteria: Main Signed date write informed consent . Men woman age 18 85 year inclusive . Have general good stable health condition confirm physical examination medical history . Have least 4 10 clinically confirm hyperkeratotic AK target lesion moderate severe intensity within face/forehead bald scalp Skin type I IV accord Fitzpatrick 's . Are free significant physical abnormality ( e.g. , tattoo , dermatosis ) potential treatment area may cause difficulty examination final evaluation . Physical ability apply study preparation correctly follow study restriction visit . Women childbearing potential allow participate study , use highly effective method contraception Main Have receive treatment AK within treatment area ( face / scalp ) three month precede clinical trial . Have know hypersensitivity ingredient Are subject immunosuppressive therapy . Having coagulation defect inherit acquire Have evidence clinically significant , unstable medical condition Have currently malignant benign tumor skin within treatment area Subjects take topical systemic treatment might interfere study end point , within time window allow , currently take phenytoin , methotrexate sulfonylurea . Subjects take inhibitor DPD ( e.g . Brivudin , Sorivudin ) Are know pregnant lactating ( currently within past 3 month ) . Have dermatological disease treatment area surround area may exacerbate treatment Are currently within past 8 week participate another clinical study . Have active chemical dependency alcoholism assess investigator . Subject institutionalized legal regulatory order .
